constraints.name: interval_coverage
constraints.description: 所有区间必须被至少一个选定的区间覆盖（即每个区间的起点和终点都包含在某个选定区间内）

constraints.name: mergeable_intervals
constraints.description: 两个区间可以合并当且仅当它们有重叠部分，合并后的区间为两者的时间并集
constraints.formal: a ∩ b ≠ ∅ → merge(a, b) = [min(start(a), start(b)), max(end(a), end(b))]

constraints.name: minimize_operations
constraints.description: 需要找到最少的合并操作次数，使得选定的区间数量减少至少一个
constraints.formal: minimize |M| s.t. |S'| < |S|, where M is the set of merge operations and S' is the set of selected intervals after merging
